intro: Psychotria oua-tilouensis, commonly known as the Cameroon Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to West Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its elliptical leaves and small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pale pink. It typically grows in moist, shaded habitats within tropical rainforests. The species is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and potential ecological significance.
